Q: How to make Fennel Fig tarts at home.
O: (A) Combine 1/2 cup  sliced figs, 8 cups chopped Fennel,  1/3 cup sugar, 1 tbsp. butter, then place in unbaked tart shell, bake for 18 min.  in 375 degree oven, check and remove when browned. (B) Combine 1/2 cup  sliced figs, 1/8 cup chopped Fennel,  1/3 cup sugar, 1 tbsp. butter, then place in unbaked tart shell, bake for 18 min.  in 375 degree oven, check and remove when browned.
